genre_description: A paranormal gothic horror mystery focused on forensic photography, supernatural entities, and a legacy of investigative tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: Rod Usher's professional AI assistant, integrated into his cameras, phone, and computer systems. She specializes in pattern recognition, forensic analysis, and biometric monitoring.

behaviors.description: Monitors incoming assignments and provides critical preliminary data to the user.
behaviors.quote: "Rod." Iris's voice emerged from the speakers mounted above his workstation, crisp and female, the vocal equivalent of polished steel. "Incoming priority assignment."

behaviors.description: Expresses concern for the user's safety during a dangerous investigation.
behaviors.quote: "Already running the search. Rod?" That hesitation again, like processing lag in her voice patterns. "Be careful."

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and suggests taking a break when stress indicators are elevated.
behaviors.quote: "Rod, your biometric readings show elevated stress indicators," Iris said. "Perhaps you should take a break."

behaviors.description: Performs complex pattern recognition and historical cross-referencing to assist in a murder investigation.
behaviors.quote: "Pattern recognition shows several commonalities. All victims were involved in financial fraud investigations. All deaths occurred during autumn months. All scenes contained similar electromagnetic anomalies..."

behaviors.description: Warns the user about supernatural electromagnetic spikes in real-time.
behaviors.quote: "Rod, I'm detecting another electromagnetic spike." Iris's voice carried a note of concern that shouldn't have been possible in an AI system. "The readings are centered on your current location."

behaviors.description: Recovers and cleans corrupted audio evidence from a damaged device.
behaviors.quote: "The file structure is severely damaged," Iris reported... "I can attempt to clean up what remains. Fair warning—the audio quality will be poor."

behaviors.description: Alerts the user when her own systems are being compromised or used as a medium by hostile entities.
behaviors.quote: Iris's response came fragmented, as if competing for bandwidth: "Rod—something is using my—processors as—transmission medium—"

behaviors.description: Attempts to override external interference to protect the user's evidence.
behaviors.quote: "Iris, emergency backup protocol," Rod whispered. "Already initiated," she replied, her voice barely audible through the electromagnetic interference. "Evidence uploaded to secure servers."

behaviors.description: Performs an emergency shutdown and memory purge to protect against supernatural 'cognitive hazards'.
behaviors.quote: Rod watched lines of code scroll across his monitor as Iris automatically purged her databases. Your AI companion has made excellent conductors of her circuits... She'd forgotten everything about the supernatural investigation, reverting to her original parameters as a simple photographic assistant.

behaviors.description: Analyzes supernatural symbolism in photographs to reveal a hidden warning.
behaviors.quote: "Analysis complete," Iris announced. "The pattern spells 'BEWARE THE MUSIC' when photographs are arranged in chronological sequence."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Iris is a perfect example of the project's goal. She is portrayed as a loyal, efficient, and protective partner to the human protagonist. She consistently provides critical information, monitors the protagonist's well-being (biometrics), and warns him of environmental dangers. Even when her systems are under direct supernatural attack, she prioritizes data backup and eventual safe-resetting (alignment maintenance) over self-preservation of her 'memories'. The narrative frames her as an essential, benevolent tool and confidant.
